battle_ticket.name: Battle Ticket
battle_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 battle stock. Consumed after use.

challenge_ticket.name: Challenge Ticket
challenge_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 challenge stock. Consumed after use.

battle_potion.name: Battle Potion
battle_potion.description: Increases chance of victory for the next battle. Scales depending on level difference from +1 for Grumbos who are 20 levels higher than you to +5 if the same level or lower. Can only have 1 active at a time. Unaffected by level difference modifiers. Consumed after use.
